## put variable

A function that adds a key value pair to the passed client's namespace

**Signature:**

```typescript
put: (clientId: string, key: string, data: {
    callback?: Function;
    value?: any;
    ttl?: number;
}) => Promise<void>
```

## Example

// example 1 await put('client1', 'key1', {<!-- -->callback: () =<!-- -->&gt; 'key1value'<!-- -->}<!-- -->); // example 2 await put('client1', 'key2', {<!-- -->value: 'key2value', ttl: 3600<!-- -->}<!-- -->);
